name: linkedin-automation
description: Complete LinkedIn automation system with AI personalization and cost optimization

scripts.bmad:init: echo '🚀 BMAD Init - LinkedIn Automation Project Initialized'
scripts.bmad:flatten: echo '📁 Flattening codebase context...' && find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.json' -o -name '*.md' | head -20
scripts.bmad:plan: echo '🧠 Multi-agent planning for automation workflows...'
scripts.bmad:health: echo '🏥 System Health Check' && curl -s http://localhost:5678 > /dev/null && echo '✅ n8n Running' || echo '❌ n8n Down'

author: raphael656-GTM
